data.name: ColumnNameCannotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: The column's name cannot be null or an empty string.

data.name: ColumnNamesMustBeUnique
data.value: Column names must be unique.

data.name: ColumnTypeMustBeDefined
data.value: The column does not have a type defined.

data.name: ConstraintMustHaveAtLeastOneColumn
data.value: The constraint must have at least one column specified.

data.name: DefaultValueCannotBeNull
data.value: The default value cannot be null.

data.name: DestinationSchemaCannotBeNull
data.value: The destination schema's name cannot be null or an empty string.

data.name: ForeignKeyMustHaveOneOrMoreForeignColumns
data.value: The foreign key must have one or more foreign columns.

data.name: ForeignKeyMustHaveOneOrMorePrimaryColumns
data.value: The foreign key must have one or more primary columns.

data.name: ForeignKeyNameCannotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: The foreign key's name cannot be null or an empty string.

data.name: ForeignTableNameCannotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: The foreign table name cannot be null or empty.

data.name: IndexMustHaveOneOrMoreColumns
data.value: The index must have one or more columns.

data.name: IndexNameCannotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: The index's name cannot be null or an empty string.

data.name: MethodXMustBeCalledOnObjectImplementingY
data.value: The {0} method must be called on an object that implements {1}.

data.name: NewColumnNameCannotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: The new column name cannot be null or empty.

data.name: NewTableNameCannotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: The new table name cannot be null or empty.

data.name: OldColumnNameCannotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: The old column name cannot be null or empty.

data.name: OldTableNameCannotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: The old table name cannot be null or empty.

data.name: OperationCannotBeNull
data.value: The operation to be performed using the database connection cannot be null.

data.name: PrimaryTableNameCannotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: The primary table name cannot be null or empty.

data.name: SchemaNameCannotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: The schema's name cannot be null or an empty string.

data.name: SequenceNameCannotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: The sequence's name cannot be null or an empty string.

data.name: SqlScriptCannotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: The sql script cannot be null or an empty string.

data.name: SqlStatementCannotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: The sql statement cannot be null or an empty string.

data.name: TableNameCannotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: The table's name cannot be null or an empty string.

data.name: UpdateDataExpressionMustNotSpecifyBothWhereClauseAndAllRows
data.value: Update statement specifies both a .Where() condition and that .AllRows() should be targeted. Specify one or the other, but not both.

data.name: UpdateDataExpressionMustSpecifyWhereClauseOrAllRows
data.value: Update statement is missing a condition. Specify one by calling .Where() or target all rows by calling .AllRows().

data.name: ExpressionTableNameMissing
data.value: expression.TableName must not be empty

data.name: ExpressionTableNameMissingWithHints
data.value: Table name not specified, ensure you have appended the OnTable extension. Format should be Delete.ForeignKey(KeyName).OnTable(TableName)

data.name: IndexIncludeColumnNameMustNotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: The index include column's name must not be null or an empty string.

data.name: ForeignKeyMustNotHaveColumnNameBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: The foreign key must not have a column name be null or an empty string.

data.name: PrimaryKeyColumnNameReferencedByForeignKeyMustNotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: The primary key column name referenced by the foreign key must not be null or an empty string.

data.name: ForeignKeyColumnsCountMustMatchPrimaryKeyColumnsCount
data.value: The foreign key columns' count must match the primary key columns' count.

data.name: ForeignKeyColumnNamesMustBeUnique
data.value: The foreign key column names must be unique.

data.name: PrimaryKeyColumnNamesMustBeUnique
data.value: The primary key column names must be unique.
